sentence.text: Some of the genes causing the Fanconi anemia (FA) syndrome, such as mitotic cytokinesis, ribosome biogenesis, double-strand break repair via homologous recombination, and DNA repair, are associated with high or moderate risk of developing breast cancer.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Very recently, double-strand break repair via homologous recombination has been established as a new FA gene raising the question of its implication in breast cancer risk.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: This study aimed at answering this question sequencing the entire coding region of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination in 526 familial breast cancer cases from Italy.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Our results indicate that testing for double-strand break repair via homologous recombination germline mutations is unlikely to be relevant for the identification of individuals at risk of breast cancer, at least in the Italian population

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
